channel.title: Need help with drops for npc's
channel.description: Ok im using delta scape base and i changed a lot of things around. But I want to edit my drops for the npcs and add more stuff to it and make some items drop rarley. also when i want to change my background client pic it wont let me it goes back to the origional on e any help will be appricated!!!

didnt work i opened it with paint put my pic in there and then saved and complied didnt work
